docs.snippet: Wisconsin election officials say last month's presidential recount cost a little more than $2 million, about $1.5 million less than originally projected....
docs.lead_paragraph: Wisconsin election officials say last month's presidential recount cost a little more than $2 million, about $1.5 million less than originally projected.

docs.snippet: Ghana's new President Nana Akufo-Addo named the co-founder of investment bank Databank, Ken Ofori-Atta, as finance minister on Tuesday as he seeks to revitalize an economy that is heavily reliant on commodities....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ghana's new President Nana Akufo-Addo named the co-founder of investment bank Databank, Ken Ofori-Atta, as finance minister on Tuesday as he seeks to revitalize an economy that is heavily reliant on commodities.

headline.main: Ghana President Names Former Investment Banker as Finance Minister
headline.print_headline: Ghana President Names Former Investment Banker as Finance Minister

docs.snippet: The United Arab Emirates' ambassador in Afghanistan has been injured in bomb attack at a guest house in the eastern city of Kandahar, the UAE foreign ministry said in a statement on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The United Arab Emirates' ambassador in Afghanistan has been injured in bomb attack at a guest house in the eastern city of Kandahar, the UAE foreign ministry said in a statement on Tuesday.

headline.main: UAE Says Ambassador to Afghanistan Injured in Kandahar Bomb Attack
headline.print_headline: UAE Says Ambassador to Afghanistan Injured in Kandahar Bomb Attack

docs.snippet: An explosion in the southern Afghan city of Kandahar on Tuesday killed at least seven people and wounded 18 others, including the provincial governor and the United Arab Emirates ambassador who was visiting the city, officials said....
docs.lead_paragraph: An explosion in the southern Afghan city of Kandahar on Tuesday killed at least seven people and wounded 18 others, including the provincial governor and the United Arab Emirates ambassador who was visiting the city, officials said.

headline.main: Seven Dead in Blast in Afghan City That Wounds UAE Ambassador
headline.print_headline: Seven Dead in Blast in Afghan City That Wounds UAE Ambassador

docs.snippet: Senators signaled little opposition Tuesday to the nomination of James Mattis to be defense secretary, as national security experts recommended lawmakers amend the law and allow the retired Marine Corps general to head the Pentagon for President-e...
docs.lead_paragraph: Senators signaled little opposition Tuesday to the nomination of James Mattis to be defense secretary, as national security experts recommended lawmakers amend the law and allow the retired Marine Corps general to head the Pentagon for President-elect Donald Trump.

headline.main: Senators Voice Little Opposition to Mattis as Defense Chief
headline.print_headline: Senators Voice Little Opposition to Mattis as Defense Chief

docs.snippet: A Houston-area man says sheriff's deputies conducted faulty field tests on cat litter they found in his vehicle, which they believed was methamphetamine....

headline.print_headline: Houston-Area Man Says Deputies Mistook Cat Litter for Meth

docs.snippet: A woman charged with killing four people and injuring dozens more by driving her car into spectators at Oklahoma State University's 2015 homecoming parade was sentenced Tuesday to life in prison after accepting a plea deal....
docs.lead_paragraph: A woman charged with killing four people and injuring dozens more by driving her car into spectators at Oklahoma State University's 2015 homecoming parade was sentenced Tuesday to life in prison after accepting a plea deal.

headline.main: Woman Sentenced to Life in Oklahoma State Homecoming Crash
headline.print_headline: Woman Sentenced to Life in Oklahoma State Homecoming Crash
